titles.title: More Love To Thee! (Elizabeth P. Prentiss)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More love to Thee, O Christ, more love to Thee. Hear now the prayer I make on bended knee. This is my earnest plea, more love, O Christ, to Thee. More love to Thee, more love to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once earthly joy I craved, sought peace and rest. Now Thee alone I seek, give what is best. This all my prayer shall be, More love, O Christ, to Thee. More love to Thee, more love to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then shall my latest breath whisper Thy praise. This be the parting cry my Heart shall raise. This still its prayer shall be, More love, O Christ, to Thee. More love to Thee, more love to Thee.{/lang-eng}
